roleset.name: retest

role.descr: the test/subject matter, examined in search of

example.name: LVC: do
example.text: At that time I thought it was reliable and let it do the job because it was a subsidiary to BBMG . Later , I still had that Hua Huan company *PRO* to do the re-examination , and everything was qualified .

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: A student came in and told Dr. Richards he had come for his reexamination in Pharmacology, having flunked the course that year.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7; relation to 'examination.02'.
